item.description:
As many of you know I have been running with the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society's Team in Training for the past two years and we're gearing up for another spring season. A portion of the participants fund raising covers all expenses for their event of choice. Hope to see some New Haven Runners at the Info Meeting.

WHERE : Guilford Community Center 32 Church Street 06437


There are several exciting running events being offered this spring...

Country Music Marathon & 1/2 Marathon~ Nashville, TN April 2010

New Jersey Marathon & 1/2 Marathon~ Long Branch, NJ May 2010

Mayor's Marathon & Half Marathon ~Anchorage, AK June 2010
item.name: Team in Training - Meeting
